content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Our Customers Love Us” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left”][vc_column_text]At United Home Services, our team’s mission is to help you reap the benefits of our experts’ collective 50 years of experience. Our technicians are trained, certified, and highly-skilled in HVAC installation, repair, and maintenance services.

But most importantly, they are honest and reliable individuals who will treat your AC, chimney, dryer vents, and air ducts, as if they’re their own. Our job begins when you first contact us for an initial assessment, and we don’t stop working until you are well and truly satisfied with our services.

Also, considering the current pandemic, our technicians have undergone thorough training in proactive protection strategies to keep our customers safe. We use masks, gloves, and feet covers when visiting our customers’ homes to reduce the risk of infection.

We are able to maintain little to no physical contact to still provide exceptional service while social distancing. 

  • Available for calls 24/7
  • Certified, insured, and licensed technicians
  • Technicians are equipped with Personal Protective Equipment to decrease the risk of coronavirus
  •  Services are performed in a timely fashion because we respect your time
  • Clean up the site after we are done
  • Clear communication to let you know exactly what we are doing and why we are doing it
  • 100% satisfaction guarantee
  • Fair pricing and no hidden charges

In our 20+ years of serving homeowners across five states, we have mastered the art of customer service. Our vehicles are always well-stocked, so most of the time, we can finish a job in just one visit, no matter how complicated it seems. 

Whether you need basic AC maintenance or a deep cleaning for your home’s ductwork, we almost always finish the job the same day.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Need air conditioner repair, Duct Cleaning or a New Installation? Call Us For Assistance” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left”][vc_column_text]We know you have several options when it comes to HVAC or home maintenance companies in your city. What sets United Home Services apart from the rest of them are our guarantees. We will perform our job within predetermined time so you don’t have to disrupt your daily routine.

And if you are not satisfied with the job we did for you, we won’t charge you a penny more. We don’t believe in empty promises unless they can be backed by a guarantee—which is why we offer a 100% customer satisfaction guarantee. So, you know the job will be done right, on-time.

Finally, our prices are upfront, so you don’t have to stress about any surprises when the bill becomes due. You’re welcome to compare our quotes with our competitors – we offer the most competitive prices in the HVAC industry.

At United Home Services, we take immense pride in our reputation as one of the top home services providers across five states: 

  • Maryland
  • Pennsylvania
  • Texas
  • Washington
  •  Connecticut

We are best known as the reliable home duct cleaners for improving the indoor air quality in residential properties.

In our 20+ years of experience across dozens of cities, we have been blessed to work with hundreds of homeowners who trusted us with enhancing the quality of their homes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Here Is What Our Clients Have To Say About Us:” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522345138439{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1459850666073{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Debra Darthard” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277455394{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1474963678218{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”I had these guys come out in August of 2018. My house is always dusty and I had no idea how to stop it. When the guys cleaned out the air ducts, air return, and main unit, my house had the most wonderful smell AND no dust for 4 months. They were professional but very friendly. They explained everything that they were doing and why. They also told me how to keep it clean longer. The best part was the price. I’ve had other companies do the cleaning but not like them. I’ll be calling them back out this year.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277472977{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Keely Stewart” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277487340{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063493055{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”We contacted United Home Services after purchasing our home in the historic district. It was found during our home inspection that our dryer vent desperately needed to be cleaned out and was a potential fire hazard. United Home Services provided us with excellent customer service from beginning to end at a very affordable rate. The technician was prompt, friendly, and knowledgeable. Overall, we were extremely pleased with their service and will be using them again.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277503273{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1461666504301{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Heidi Tracy” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277518429{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063499534{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”This is one of the nicest experiences I’ve ever had in regard to home maintenance and repair. The scheduling process was easy, the response was immediate, and the technician was thorough, knowledgeable and considerate. We found a nest of wasps in my chimney, so what should have been an easy inspection and cleaning ended up requiring three trips. Assaf wasn’t concerned about his time, in what turned out to be a complicated ordeal, as much as he was concerned about my safety. What a quality person, which makes me believe this is the company’s work ethic and culture.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522345138439{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1459850666073{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Tommy Love” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277562392{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1474963678218{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Eli arrived on time and did an excellent job cleaning our dryer vent. Very personable young man. Will definitely use United Home Services again.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277571358{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Michael Mancino” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277580685{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063493055{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”This company saved our butts today. We are set to close on our sale tomorrow but the chimney needed to be cleaned. We contacted them after hours and explained the situation and they came to us within the hour. Really appreciate the help and they were upbeat, positive, and did a great job. Will definitely use them for other services!” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277591508{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1461666504301{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Dorothea Laster” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277603951{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063499534{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”I was selling my home and duct cleaning was something the buyers wanted. Eli did a good job cleaning my dryer vent/ducts. He was fast and thorough and we even had a minute to share our mutual love of rescue dogs. I recommend United Home Air Duct Services.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522345138439{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1459850666073{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Prescott Corsi” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277637858{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1474963678218{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Daniel arrived when expected and got right to work. He explained everything that needed to be done and why it was important. Having a dryer vent cleaned made a great difference in the perf of our dryer. It actually cut our drying time in half. I definitely recommend this company and Daniel is the best.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277655813{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Marion Palencia” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277685795{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063493055{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Excellent service. Nice tech. Found a place where a previous company had broken the duct and fixed it. Good prices. I’ll use them again.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277666895{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1461666504301{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Cosalyn Young” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277716542{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063499534{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”I contacted UHS to clean my air vents. The first time they came out the issue was not resolved, however, after calling to alert them that I still was having problems they actually sent the technician out this past Sunday as a courtesy. The technician was extremely helpful and took the time to fully explain what the issue was and what he did to correct it. Great customer service is always worthy of a 5 star rating.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522345138439{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1459850666073{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Deepa Holland” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277755949{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1474963678218{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”United Home Services called me as a request from Home Advisor. Eliav came out and inspected the vents and blower. He took pictures to show me the issues that need attention. Their estimate was very reasonable compared to others. Eliav did a great job cleaning the system, and I am happy to know my family is breathing cleaner air” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277747535{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Steve Mirren” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277774917{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063493055{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Great company! Customer service was fantastic, you can tell they possess a lot of experience in what they do and are very knowledgeable. The rates they offer are very affordable also. We will recommend them to family and friends!” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277766929{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1461666504301{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Omar Esquivel Ortiz” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277806530{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063499534{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”They came to take care of the pizza oven in our business very prompt and professional.

Highly recommend this company.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522345138439{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1459850666073{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Robert Schermerhorn” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277824170{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1474963678218{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Eli arrived on time and had my vent issue totally resolved in about 30 minutes. I will definitely call Eli / UHS for future service.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277832237{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Susan Jackson” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277851339{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063493055{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”We needed to have our chimney cleaned. Assaf contacted me, as requested when he was on his way; arrived on time; was very professional and courteous. He did a great job and cleaned up very well when he was finished. We will definitely use United Home Services again, and will most definitely request Assaf personally. Very pleased!” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277840889{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1461666504301{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Tonika Baucham” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277860923{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063499534{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Very efficient. Super fast and reliable!!

Highly recommend.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522345138439{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1459850666073{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Stephanie Brooks” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277984596{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1474963678218{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Technician was super friendly and showed me before and after pictures and I was very impressed. Will use again in the future.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277994678{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”D. Brooks” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277954682{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063493055{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Courtesy, professional and did quality work on time.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605277967709{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522345138439{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1459850666073{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Nancy R.” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522314082547{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Fort Worth, TX” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1474963678218{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Project: Clean Heating & Cooling Air Ducts & Vents
Comments: Very professional and cleaned- up after themselves. They also painted the vents. She was impressed.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522314121080{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Joe D.” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522314234736{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Celina, TX” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063493055{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Project: Clean and Inspect a Chimney or Fireplace
Comments: On time, professional, overall a great experience and value for the money” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522314215229{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1461666504301{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Cathy A.” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522314289287{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Princeton, TX” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063499534{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Project: Clean and Inspect a Chimney or Fireplace
Comments: The workers were knowledgeable, polite and very helpful. I was just moving in and they even offered to assist moving some boxes for me. !!” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1474966293669{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1475662686846{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Colleen G.” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522314346953{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Fort Worth, TX” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1474963678218{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Project: Clean and Inspect a Chimney or Fireplace
Comments: Quick to come out and explained all steps in detail before doing any repairs.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522314327559{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Beverly M.” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522314436869{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Royse City, TX” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063493055{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Project: Clean Heating & Cooling Air Ducts & Vents
Comments: We hired United Home Cleaning for our HAVC system. We just moved into the home and wanted the assurance of a well functioning system. Joseph was our technician and did a wonderful job. Explained and answered our questions, suggested an efficient air cleaner which he installed. There was no pressure or hard sell. Because all 3 adults in family suffer from allergies, we knew it would be a good investment. And I swear the house smells better already. Couldn’t be more pleased or satisfied with a job well done. Thanx to Home Advisor for the recommendation.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522314417684{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1461666504301{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Sandy R.” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522314494061{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Garland, TX” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%231c1c1c” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_raw_html el_class=”wh-testimonial-stars” css=”.vc_custom_1461063499534{margin-bottom: 8px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Project: Clean and Inspect a Chimney or Fireplace
Comments: Extremely knowledgeable tech cleaned and repaired fireplace. Alex was informative and helped educate me on some tips concerning the fireplace. Assisted in getting insulation placed in attic on the same day. I feel much safer using my fireplace now!!” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
